alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; Northern Monterey Bay; San Francisco; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Sonoma Coastal Range; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 3:10AM PST until January 22 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of California. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wind advisory will be in effect from 10 PM Sunday to 4 AM Monday PST for strong and gusty southerly winds along the coast and in the coastal mountains. Wind gusts up to 50 mph are possible at ridge tops and high elevations. In lower elevations, gusts of 30 to 35 mph are expected. Take care to secure loose outdoor items that can easily be blown over such as furniture and decorations.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
